          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">English spelling rules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Rechtschreibungrichtlinien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règles anglaises d'épellation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Réguas inglesas da soletração</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Reglas inglesas del deletreo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a set of flash cards to learn the logic of English spelling, and practice with Flashcards</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un ensemble de cartes instantanées pour 
apprendre la logique de l'épellation anglaise, et pratique avec

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é um jogo dos cartões flash para aprender

            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un insieme delle schedi istantanee per

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα σύνολο καρτών λάμψης για να μάθει τη
